column3: â€œThis weed... Dayum.. I fucking love this strain. All the positive qualities of a sativa yet it was relaxing to the max. No stress, all fun and games. Quite talkative in group atmospheres. I would buy this strain over and over till I die.â€
â€œA very high functioning strand. Purely cerebral.â€

â€œHigh-quality medicine. I tried and still am using the LA Confidential Indica co2 oil, but it was hard to have the energy to take another dab when my Crohn's flares would come back 15-20 minutes after dabbing took them away. With this Lemon Thai Sativa, I can take a dab of this co2 oil, top shelf quality oil for all the strains, but the Sativa or strain or general is very helpful for me. 
              I right now can...â€

â€œI had actually avoided this strain based on reviews & word of mouth, however, my dispensary was down to slim pickings so I finally thought what the hell.  I immediately thought to myself,Why the hell did I wait so long to try this sugar coated happiness?"  This is one of my top 3 favorites for daytime use.  It helps me stay upbeat & creative throughout my tiring
â€œGood daytime energetic Sativa... would definitely get again, anytime.â€

â€œVintage sativa (borderline landrace - it's parents are Thai and Hawaii, though most specimens now will have been genetically modified for stability and cannabinoid augmentation) that will give you a swift psycho-somatic buzz that hones in on cerebral drifting ... at the same it loosens up the body and provides a nice wind of euphoric energy. Very popular in LA amongst the cannabis hip.â€

â€œSuch a great high and the aroma of this strain smells so good. A nice head high but I was still able to focus and get things done around the house.â€

â€œLemon Thai not only pleasing to the eye but the aroma from this strain is incredible: it's a fresh tangy yet sweet scent.  Whether smoked from a vaporizer or from a joint the zesty lemon taste is delicious.  This is a great strain with high THC that will surely deliver a great high.  Although, it should be noted the effects from the indica side of the plant will make you tired, so it may not be the best choice for du...â€

â€œThis strain has a nice lemony aroma. One of the nicest smelling strains I've ever come across for sure, especially once it's ground.
